[Chatwoot Developer Docs home page![light logo](https://mintlify.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/chatwoot-447c5a93/logo/light.png)![dark logo](https://mintlify.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/chatwoot-447c5a93/logo/dark.png)](https://developers.chatwoot.com/) Search... Ctrl K Search... Navigation Conversations Create New Conversation POST / api / v1 / accounts / {account\_id} / conversations Try it cURL Python JavaScript PHP Go Java Copy ``` curl --request POST \ --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/conversations \ --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ --header 'api_access_token: ' \ --data '{ "source_id": "1234567890", "inbox_id": 1, "contact_id": 1, "additional_attributes": { "browser": "Chrome", "browser_version": "89.0.4389.82", "os": "Windows", "os_version": "10" }, "custom_attributes": { "attribute_key": "attribute_value", "priority_conversation_number": 3 }, "status": "open", "assignee_id": 1, "team_id": 1, "snoozed_until": "2030-07-21T17:32:28Z", "message": { "content": "Hello, how can I help you?", "template_params": { "name": "sample_issue_resolution", "category": "UTILITY", "language": "en_US", "processed_params": { "1": "Chatwoot" } } } }' ``` 200 403 Copy ``` { "id": 123, "account_id": 123, "inbox_id": 123 } ``` #### Authorizations userApiKeyagentBotApiKey [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#authorization-api-access-token) api\_access\_token string header required This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user. #### Path Parameters [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#parameter-account-id) account\_id integer required The numeric ID of the account #### Body application/json [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-source-id) source\_id string required Conversation source id Example: `"1234567890"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-inbox-id) inbox\_id integer required Id of inbox in which the conversation is created
Allowed Inbox Types: Website, Phone, Api, Email Example: `1` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-contact-id) contact\_id integer Contact Id for which conversation is created Example: `1` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-additional-attributes) additional\_attributes object Lets you specify attributes like browser information Example: ``` { "browser": "Chrome", "browser_version": "89.0.4389.82", "os": "Windows", "os_version": "10" } ``` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-custom-attributes) custom\_attributes object The object to save custom attributes for conversation, accepts custom attributes key and value Example: ``` { "attribute_key": "attribute_value", "priority_conversation_number": 3 } ``` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-status) status enum Specify the conversation whether it's pending, open, closed Available options: `open`, `resolved`, `pending` Example: `"open"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-assignee-id) assignee\_id integer Agent Id for assigning a conversation to an agent Example: `1` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-team-id) team\_id integer Team Id for assigning a conversation to a team\ Example: `1` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-snoozed-until) snoozed\_until string Snoozed until date time Example: `"2030-07-21T17:32:28Z"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message) message object The initial message to be sent to the conversation Show child attributes [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message-content) message.content string required The content of the message Example: `"Hello, how can I help you?"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message-template-params) message.template\_params object The template params for the message in case of whatsapp Channel Show child attributes [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message-template-params-name) message.template\_params.name string Name of the template Example: `"sample_issue_resolution"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message-template-params-category) message.template\_params.category string Category of the template Example: `"UTILITY"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message-template-params-language) message.template\_params.language string Language of the template Example: `"en_US"` [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#body-message-template-params-processed-params) message.template\_params.processed\_params object The processed param values for template variables in template Example: ``` { "1": "Chatwoot" } ``` #### Response 200 200403 application/json Success [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#response-id) id number ID of the conversation [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#response-account-id) account\_id number Account Id [​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/create-new-conversation#response-inbox-id) inbox\_id number ID of the inbox Next](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/conversations-filter) cURL Python JavaScript PHP Go Java Copy ``` curl --request POST \ --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/conversations \ --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ --header 'api_access_token: ' \ --data '{ "source_id": "1234567890", "inbox_id": 1, "contact_id": 1, "additional_attributes": { "browser": "Chrome", "browser_version": "89.0.4389.82", "os": "Windows", "os_version": "10" }, "custom_attributes": { "attribute_key": "attribute_value", "priority_conversation_number": 3 }, "status": "open", "assignee_id": 1, "team_id": 1, "snoozed_until": "2030-07-21T17:32:28Z", "message": { "content": "Hello, how can I help you?", "template_params": { "name": "sample_issue_resolution", "category": "UTILITY", "language": "en_US", "processed_params": { "1": "Chatwoot" } } } }' ``` 200 403 Copy ``` { "id": 123, "account_id": 123, "inbox_id": 123 }
